text: Helen Joyce Reynolds (October 7, 1924 - September 24, 2019) was a former American actress. She worked for Warner Bros. during the 1940s. Reynolds made her acting debut with a small part in the 1942 movie Yankee Doodle Dandy. She also appeared in George Washington Slept Here as Madge, The Constant Nymph as Paula Sanger, and The Adventures of Mark Twain as Clara Clemens. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Joyce Reynolds in clip from Janie via YouTube Category:1924 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Detroit
title: Joyce Reynolds (actress)
